wikipedia_page.main:
Sir Joseph Sebag-Montefiore (born 29 August 1822 in London, died 19 January 1903 in London) was a British banker, stockbroker and politician.
He was the son of Solomon Sebag and his wife Sarah Montefiore. He married Adelaide Cohen, daughter of Louis Cohen and Rebecca Floretta Keyser, in June 1851.On 29 August 1885 his surname was supplemented with royal permission with that of his mother's family as Sebag-Montefiore.He was the nephew and heir of Moses Montefiore.
